languages.text: Болтер модели Годвин, врученный сестре Ардженте в день принятия ею обетов ордена Пресвятой Девы-Мученицы. Увы, вопреки гордому имени, за годы странствий и столкновений с ужасами неведомого сияние его металла померкло, а священные молитвы, выгравированные на стволе, утратили резную четкость. С каждым выстрелом из него в ореоле святости, окружающем благородное орудие, гаснет еще одна искра.

This Godwyn-pattern bolter was given to Sister Argenta on the day she took her vows to join the Order of the Martyred Lady. Unfortunately, despite its illustrious name, the gleam of its metal has dulled after years of travel and encounters with horrors untold, and the sacred prayers engraved on the barrel have been worn smooth in places. With every shot it fires, another spark goes out in the halo of sanctity that surrounds this noble weapon.
languages.original_text: Болтер модели Годвин, врученный сестре Ардженте в день принятия ею обетов ордена Пресвятой Девы-Мученицы. Увы, вопреки гордому имени, за годы странствий и столкновений с ужасами неведомого сияние его металла померкло, а священные молитвы, выгравированные на стволе, утратили резную четкость. С каждым выстрелом из него в ореоле святости, окружающем благородное орудие, гаснет еще одна искра.

traits.locale_text: This Godwyn-De'az pattern bolter was given to Sister Argenta on the day she took her vows to join the Order of the Martyred Lady. Unfortunately, despite its illustrious name, the gleam of its metal has dulled after years of travel and encounters with horrors untold, and the sacred prayers engraved on the barrel have been worn smooth in places. With every shot it fires, another spark goes out in the halo of sanctity that surrounds this noble weapon.

This Godwyn-De'az pattern bolter was given to Sister Argenta on the day she took her vows to join the Order of the Martyred Lady. Unfortunately, despite its illustrious name, the gleam of its metal has dulled after years of travel and encounters with horrors untold, and the sacred prayers engraved on the barrel have been worn smooth in places. With every shot it fires, another spark goes out in the halo of sanctity that surrounds this noble weapon.

This Godwyn-De'az pattern bolter was given to Sister Argenta on the day she took her vows to join the Order of the Martyred Lady. Unfortunately, despite its illustrious name, the gleam of its metal has dulled after years of travel and encounters with horrors untold, and the sacred prayers engraved on the barrel have been worn smooth in places. With every shot it fires, another spark goes out in the halo of sanctity that surrounds this noble weapon.

This Godwyn-pattern bolter was given to Sister Argenta on the day she took her vows to join the Order of the Martyred Lady. Unfortunately, despite its illustrious name, the gleam of its metal has dulled after years of travel and encounters with horrors untold, and the sacred prayers engraved on the barrel have been worn smooth in places. With every shot it fires, another spark goes out in the halo of sanctity that surrounds this noble weapon.

languages.text:
このゴドウィン-デズ模様は、シスター・アルジェンタが聖女修道会に加わる誓いを立てた日に授かったものだ。
その立派な名前の割に、残念ながら金属の輝きは経年と言葉にできない恐怖に遭遇したため、色あせている。シリンダーに刻まれた神聖な祈り文はすり減って滑らかになっている。一発毎に、火花がはじけ、この高貴な武器の周囲は聖なる光に包まれる。
languages.original_text: This Godwyn-pattern bolter was given to Sister Argenta on the day she took her vows to join the Order of the Martyred Lady. Unfortunately, despite its illustrious name, the gleam of its metal has dulled after years of travel and encounters with horrors untold, and the sacred prayers engraved on the barrel have been worn smooth in places. With every shot it fires, another spark goes out in the halo of sanctity that surrounds this noble weapon.

traits.locale_text:
このゴドウィン-デズ模様のボルターは、シスター・アルジェンタが聖女修道会に加わる誓いを立てた日に授かったものだ。
その立派な名前の割に、残念ながら金属の輝きは経年と言葉にできない恐怖に遭遇したため、色あせている。シリンダーに刻まれた神聖な祈り文はすり減って滑らかになっている。一発毎に、火花がはじけ、この高貴な武器の周囲は聖なる光に包まれる。

languages.text: 这把戈德温型爆矢枪，是阿洁塔修女在宣誓加入‘殉教圣女’修会的当天得到的礼物。经过了多年的征战与无数恐怖经历的磨砺下，这把大名鼎鼎的武器已经失去原本闪亮的金属光泽，刻在枪管上的几行神圣祷文也已模糊难辨。每射出一发子弹，这把神圣武器周围的神圣之光就会熄灭一分。
languages.original_text: This Godwyn-pattern bolter was given to Sister Argenta on the day she took her vows to join the Order of the Martyred Lady. Unfortunately, despite its illustrious name, the gleam of its metal has dulled after years of travel and encounters with horrors untold, and the sacred prayers engraved on the barrel have been worn smooth in places. With every shot it fires, another spark goes out in the halo of sanctity that surrounds this noble weapon.

traits.locale_text: 这把戈德温·德阿兹样式的爆矢枪，是阿洁塔修女在宣誓加入‘殉教圣女’修会的当天得到的礼物。经过了多年的征战与无数恐怖经历的磨砺下，这把大名鼎鼎的武器已经失去原本闪亮的金属光泽，刻在枪管上的几行神圣祷文也已模糊难辨。每射出一发子弹，这把神圣武器周围的神圣之光就会熄灭一分。

languages.text: Ce bolter modèle Godwyn a été offert à Sœur Argenta le jour où elle a prononcé ses vœux pour rejoindre l'Ordre de Notre-Dame des Martyrs. Son nom illustre n'a malheureusement pas empêché le métal de perdre de son éclat après des années de voyages et de combats contre des horreurs indicibles, et certaines des prières sacrées gravées sur son canon ont fini par s'effacer. Chacun des tirs de cette arme fait s'éteindre une étincelle dans le halo de sainteté qui l'entoure.
languages.original_text: This Godwyn-pattern bolter was given to Sister Argenta on the day she took her vows to join the Order of the Martyred Lady. Unfortunately, despite its illustrious name, the gleam of its metal has dulled after years of travel and encounters with horrors untold, and the sacred prayers engraved on the barrel have been worn smooth in places. With every shot it fires, another spark goes out in the halo of sanctity that surrounds this noble weapon.

traits.locale_text: Ce bolter modèle Godwyn-De'az a été offert à Sœur Argenta le jour où elle a prononcé ses vœux pour rejoindre l'Ordre de Notre-Dame des Martyrs. Son nom illustre n'a malheureusement pas empêché le métal de perdre de son éclat après des années de voyages et de combats contre des horreurs indicibles, et certaines des prières sacrées gravées sur son canon ont fini par s'effacer. Chacun des tirs de cette arme fait s'éteindre une étincelle dans le halo de sainteté qui l'entoure.

languages.text: Diesen Bolter mit Godwyn-Muster hat Schwester Argenta an dem Tag erhalten, an dem sie dem Orden der Heiligen Märtyrerin beigetreten ist. Trotz des illustren Namens hat der Glanz des Metalls nach jahrelangen Reisen und unzähligen Kämpfen gegen grauenhafte Gegner nachgelassen. Die heiligen Gebete, die in den Lauf eingraviert waren, sind an manchen Stellen völlig glattgeschliffen. Mit jedem Schuss erlischt ein weiterer Funke in dem Heiligenschein, der diese edle Waffe umgibt.
languages.original_text: This Godwyn-pattern bolter was given to Sister Argenta on the day she took her vows to join the Order of the Martyred Lady. Unfortunately, despite its illustrious name, the gleam of its metal has dulled after years of travel and encounters with horrors untold, and the sacred prayers engraved on the barrel have been worn smooth in places. With every shot it fires, another spark goes out in the halo of sanctity that surrounds this noble weapon.

traits.locale_text: Diesen Bolter mit Godwyn-De'az-Muster hat Schwester Argenta an dem Tag erhalten, an dem sie dem Orden der Heiligen Märtyrerin beigetreten ist. Trotz des illustren Namens hat der Glanz des Metalls nach jahrelangen Reisen und unzähligen Kämpfen gegen grauenhafte Gegner nachgelassen. Die heiligen Gebete, die in den Lauf eingraviert waren, sind an manchen Stellen völlig glattgeschliffen. Mit jedem Schuss erlischt ein weiterer Funke in dem Heiligenschein, der diese edle Waffe umgibt.

languages.text: La hermana Argenta recibió este bólter modelo Godwyn cuando juró lealtad a la Orden de Nuestra Señora Mártir. Por desgracia, a pesar de su venerable nombre, el fulgor de su metal se ha ido opacando tras años de travesía y encuentros con horrores indescriptibles, así como las oraciones grabadas en su cañón se han desgastado en ciertos lugares. Con cada disparo, se apaga otra chispa en el halo sagrado que rodea esta noble arma.
languages.original_text: This Godwyn-pattern bolter was given to Sister Argenta on the day she took her vows to join the Order of the Martyred Lady. Unfortunately, despite its illustrious name, the gleam of its metal has dulled after years of travel and encounters with horrors untold, and the sacred prayers engraved on the barrel have been worn smooth in places. With every shot it fires, another spark goes out in the halo of sanctity that surrounds this noble weapon.

Por desgracia, a pesar de su venerable nombre, el fulgor de su metal se ha ido opacando tras años de travesía y encuentros con horrores indescriptibles, así como las oraciones grabadas en su cañón se han desgastado en ciertos lugares. Con cada disparo, se apaga otra chispa en el halo sagrado que rodea esta noble arma.
